page.title: 05Tavistock Pannier Market
page.content: A market has been held in Tavistock for 880 years.It is now held in a { large stone building.}You can buy almost anything there like clothes, shoes, vegetables and second hand things. The{market}is held on Fridays; the stallholders take their goods to other markets to sell on different days of the week. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * We asked 100 shoppers questions and found out that 51% of them travelled from villages outside Tavistock to shop in the market: 65% of them travelled by car and 78% of the shoppers visit the market every week. The people like the market because it is friendly and sells fresh vegetables.92% of shoppers would not like the market to close or the building used for something else.
